extension.name: PolyMesh
extension.author: Francois Guillet
extension.description: Polygonal n-gon mesh modelling for AoI, featuring modified Catmull-Clark subdivision.

history.log: General updates for AoI 3.1.0 compatibility Fixed several bugs/improved responsiveness in the UVMapping window Added Finnish translation
Spanish translation added, provided by Guillermo Perez Farquharson.
Updated for 2.8. German translation added, thanks to Iris Ahrendt. Point, Edge and Face buttons icons also thanks to Iris Ahrendt.
bug fixes on mesh smoothing when edge smoothness less than 1.0
updated for 2.6 Unfold speed up, now relies on linear ABF. Bug fixes.

Edge strip selection can be every 2n, 3rd, etc. edge rather than all edge strip. Center Mesh command added. Convertion of smoothed polymesh to trimesh for a given surface tolerance. Automatic (and faster) quad mesh smoothing for rendering, semi-auto for interactive view Bug fixes

Display properties Mesh Unfolding implemented (some features still to implement). Extrude Region bug corrected. Remove Edge bug corrected. Seams added for mesh unfolding. Extrude several edge regions bug corrected. Scale mesh bug corrected. Bevel bug corrected. 2.4 compatibility.
Edge extrusion. Extrusion along curve. Keystrokes. Bug fixes.
Bugfix release. A mirrored mesh can now be smoothed without loosing mirror.

Manipulators! Subdivision levels can be changed in the object properties panel Tension distance can be changed within window (bottom right). Experimental extract curve in edge selection mode (edge menu). Better Catmull-Clark with corners. New UI. Bugfix : closed meshes were never considered closed. Bugfix for crease edges in catmull-clark. Other bugfixes
-Catmull-Clark smoothing with edge smoothness control. -Sew edge tool. -Create Face tool.
